SEARCH
Package ConnectFour

Class Game

java.lang.Object
ConnectFour.Game
public class Game extends Object
Manages the Connect Four game, handling players, moves, and checking game states. Allows for a dynamic board size and manages player turns, winning conditions, and resets.

      public void switchPlayer()
      Switches the active player from the current player to the other player.

    • Drop

      public boolean Drop(int column)
      Attempts to drop the current player's disc in the specified column.
      Parameters:
      column - the column index where the disc will be dropped
      Returns:
      true if the disc was successfully dropped; false if the column is full

    • checkWinner

      public boolean checkWinner()
      Checks if the current player has achieved a winning condition.
      Returns:
      true if the current player has won; false otherwise

    • isDraw

      public boolean isDraw()
      Determines if the game has reached a draw, meaning the board is fully occupied.
      Returns:
      true if the board is full with no winner; false otherwise

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the game to its initial state with a new empty board and resets the current player to Player 1.
